name: VolTrainO
description:
VolTrainO is a game made over 48 hours for the GDG Game Jam with the theme You Can't Stop!.

Pete thought he was having a bad day working for the train service MetSink, little did he know it was going to get a whole lot worse. Dodge falling rocks, fire, and lasers, all while staying on board the train - try and survive as long as you can because You Can't Stop!

Credits:

Programming and modeling: SlySeville / Riley C

Programming, UI elements, Music: BBBrezel / Erin T-R

UI element design, Logo text: 7ILeo/ Hailiang L

Textures from: João Paulo on Ko-fi https://ko-fi.com/katsukagi

Player model and animations from: Mixamo https://www.mixamo.com/
